originalText.text: New to the neighborhood! Creatives rejoice!!! They have programming for children and adults that is enriching and enlightening for all. Make 3D designs from sustainable materials. Adults can sip & create on select days. Try yoga class in the morning during the week! Or book the space to host your own private function. The possibilities are only limited by your imagination.

text.text: New to the neighborhood! Creatives rejoice!!! They have programming for children and adults that is enriching and enlightening for all. Make 3D designs from sustainable materials. Adults can sip & create on select days. Try yoga class in the morning during the week! Or book the space to host your own private function. The possibilities are only limited by your imagination.

originalText.text: GG & POP hosted our daughter's 5th birthday party this year and it was an awesome success! The space is fantastic - creative and polished, very open and yet cozy. The craft activity the educators did with the kids was tailored to my daughter's interests and resulted in a take home craft for each kid along with a special birthday momento from the party for my daughter that now hangs on the wall in her room. I cannot say enough about how great it was to work with this wonderful local business for a creative and beautifully done birthday party that our whole family and guests truly enjoyed!

originalText.text: A terrific experience my niece thoroughly enjoyed the experience and learned a lot. She had fun, felt comfortable and left with a great gift. The place makes you feel at ease, safe and stimulated. Will most def be back again and can’t wait for them to expand the offering and locations. Highly encourage this exercise to stimulate creativity in your kids

originalText.text: We purchased this book for the kids of two family friends, a 4 and 5 year old, and got nothing but rave reviews! "Amazing" and "Revolutionary" are words used by each parent to describe the book. I can't wait until our son is old enough for his own copy!

text.text: We purchased this book for the kids of two family friends, a 4 and 5 year old, and got nothing but rave reviews! "Amazing" and "Revolutionary" are words used by each parent to describe the book. I can't wait until our son is old enough for his own copy!

originalText.text: It is evident that there was so much care and consideration given when creating this book!!!!!  It’s sustainable, has great writing and illustration, and wonderful activities for my fave nieces and nephews. This book has it all! I would highly recommend if you want an elevated, educational and fun experience for the little humans in your life. Highly recommend!
